page.title: 20INTERESTING PEOPLE
page.content: {MR. H. HUTCHINSON {FAN IN A MILLION-DAILY STAR 1980-81 {FAN OF THE YEAR 2nd 1982-83 {SUNDAY SUN WEMBLEY COMPETITION 1973} Mr. H. Hutchinson is well known in Sherburn for his loyalty to Sunderland A.F.C. He has supported them for 58 years.The first match he went to with his Dad was Sunderland v Arsenal in 1926.Travel in the 30's was hard.But he's only missed 2 matches in the last 25 years.Ray Daniels goal at Roker was the best he's seen.Prices have gone up from 1 old penny to Â£4.50.He'll still support them despite their relegation. His favourite player of all time was Charlie Hurley.Average crowds in the past were 50,000 although 75,000 fans attended the Sunderland v Derby match. Mr.Hutchinson has saved over 2,000 match programmes going back to 1926.
